name: Wellness Websites - Freelance Builds (6 sites across AU/NZ)
summary: Built responsive marketing websites using Nuxt.js/Vue 3, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, deployed via AWS S3 + CloudFront with SEO optimization and mobile-first layouts.
description: A series of high-performance wellness brand websites built for Australian and New Zealand clients, featuring responsive design, SEO optimization, and lightweight assets for optimal performance across all devices.
impact: Built 6 responsive marketing websites across AU/NZ markets
Implemented SEO optimization improving search rankings
Achieved mobile-first responsive layouts for all device sizes
Deployed lightweight assets for optimal performance
